alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:58AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hempstead, east central Howard and northwestern Nevada Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 557 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crater Of Diamonds State Park, or near Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Prescott, Blevins, Washington, Corinth, Center Point, McCaskill, Ozan, Oakhaven, and Boughton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
